summary: Amendment No. 1 to the Amended and Restated Senior Secured Credit Agreement, dated November 13, 2025, involves Barings BDC, Inc. and ING Capital LLC, among others, and introduces new €85,000,000 Term Commitments, extends the Maturity Date to November 13, 2030, and includes other modifications. The amendment is subject to conditions such as document submission and legal opinions.
